category: news
title: "How PBS, San Francisco Chronicle and others are using AI-driven speech-to-text software"
excerpt: "Leading publishers including PBS and the San Francisco Chronicle are utilising AI-driven speech-to-text technology to streamline their production and turn words into text. Speech to text platform Trint has been developed by former CBS news correspondent Jeff Kofman as a productivity tool for journalists inspired by his own frustrations juggling multiple tasks at speed."
